param.name: jquery
param.label: Embed jQuery
param.description: Selects, whether the plugin should attach jQuery to page, and what source is to be used.

param.name: jquerycdnpath
param.label: jQuery custom CDN
param.description: An address for grabbing jQuery from the web.

param.name: jqueryui
param.label: Embed jQuery UI
param.description: Selects, whether the plugin should attach jQuery UI to page, and what source is to be used.

param.name: jqueryuicdnpath
param.label: jQuery UI CDN path
param.description: An address for grabbing jQuery UI from the web.

param.name: jqueryuicss
param.label: Embed jQuery UI CSS
param.description: Selects, whether the plugin should attach jQuery UI CSS to page, and what source is to be used.

param.name: jqueryuicsspath
param.label: jQuery UI CSS path
param.description: An address for jQuery UI CSS from the web.

param.name: jquerytools
param.label: Embed jQuery Tools
param.description: Selects, whether the plugin should attach jQuery Tools to page, and what source is to be used.

param.name: jquerytoolscdnpath
param.label: jQuery Tools CDN path
param.description: An address for grabbing jQuery Tools from the web.

param.name: jqueryfb
param.label: Embed fancyBox
param.description: Selects, whether the plugin should attach fancyBox to page, and what source is to be used.

param.name: jqueryfbcdnpath
param.label: fancyBox CDN path
param.description: An address for grabbing fancyBox from the web.

param.name: jqueryfbcss
param.label: Embed fancyBox CSS
param.description: Selects, whether the plugin should attach fancyBox CSS to page, and what source is to be used.

param.name: jqueryfbcsspath
param.label: fancyBox CSS path
param.description: An address for fancyBox CSS from the web.

param.name: activateSite
param.label: Activate at site (frontend)
param.description: Allows to embed the libraries into the frontend site.

param.name: noconflictSite
param.label: jQuery noConflict mode
param.description: Allows to activate jQuery().noConflict() mode. Make sure you scripts are adapted. Use carefully, together with the option below this mode can disable dropdown menu in adminpanel.C

param.name: activateAdmin
param.label: Activate at administrative backend (!)
param.description: Allows to embed the libraries into adminpanel as well. Use carefully, without noConflict mode this setting can disable dropdown menu in adminpanel. You have been warned.

param.name: noconflictAdmin
param.label: jQuery noConflict mode
param.description: Allows to activate jQuery().noConflict() mode. Make sure you scripts are adapted. Use carefully, together with the option below this mode can disable dropdown menu in adminpanel.
